title: What Are Popular Design Tools?
description: Explore commonly used design tools and understand why designers rely on them every day.

words.fact: Did you know? Figma is one of the most widely used design tools today. Why it matters: real-time collaboration helps teams design faster. Today's takeaway: shared design reduces handoff delays.
Did you know? Sketch popularized reusable UI components. Why it matters: consistency improves usability. Today's takeaway: design systems scale faster when components are reused.
Did you know? InVision made clickable prototypes mainstream. Why it matters: testing early prevents costly changes. Today's takeaway: prototype before you build.
Did you know? Canva is heavily used by non-designers. Why it matters: templates lower the design barrier. Today's takeaway: good tools make design more accessible.
Did you know? Adobe tools are industry standards in design. Why it matters: familiarity improves collaboration. Today's takeaway: shared tools speed up creative workflows.
